page.title: 08Legionnaires Disease(contd)
page.content: In the hospital I was put into Ward 5, I was transfered into the intensive care unit on the 28th April 1985 on a ventilating machine,the duration of my day on the ventilator was 6 days,until the 4th May 1985 I was not breathing myself,the ventilator was doing all the work for the last 2/3 days. The resident doctor was called and gave me one hour to live,the Padre visited me and gave me the last prayer,I then started to recover and recovered enough to go back to Ward 5 for further treatment.After some three weeks at the Stafford District General Hospital I was transferred to the Stafford General Infirmary on the 10th June 1985 my stay there lasted 1 week.I was discharged on the 17th June 1985 and allowed to go home.My tablets to take home were Erythromycin 500mg.84 tablets in all.
